discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. An app builder is unable to create custom report types for objects they do not have permissions for.

When creating a custom report type, the app builder should be aware that they can only create custom report types for objects they have permissions for. This means that they must have at least "Read" access to the objects involved in the report type.

Option A is incorrect because when a custom or external object is deleted, the associated report type and reports are also deleted.

Option B is incorrect because once a report type has been deployed, it can be deleted if needed.

Option C is incorrect because the primary object selection in a custom report type can be changed even after it has been saved.
